column1: # This file contains all supported label formats one line per format.
# label = name of the label format
# units = units used for page and label dimensions (mm or inch)
# label_width = width of a single label
# label_height = height of a single label
# cols = number of label columns per page
# rows = number of label rows per page
# shape = shape of the label (rectangular or circular) (optional
# offset_x = horizontal offset from the left edge of the page to the first label (optional
# offset_y = vertical offset from the top edge of the page to the first label (optional)
